category: Product > wall covering: tile and stone
description_html: Tides is a new series in the watermark collection of hand crafted porcelain tile. Designed by artist in residence Luca Osburn, an avid surfer, the collection is named for the magical quality of the tides effecting the waves that greet him each session. This collection adds four new colors, which reflect Osburn's favorite surfing locations in Northern California.
